downloadDescription: LatticeCrypto is a high-performance and portable software library that implements lattice-based cryptographic algorithms. Last published: April 28, 2016.
detailsSection: LatticeCrypto is a high-performance and portable software library that implements lattice-based cryptographic algorithms. The first release of the library provides an implementation of lattice-based key exchange with security based on the Ring Learning With Errors (R-LWE) problem using new algorithms for the underlying Number Theoretic Transform (NTT). The chosen parameters provide at least 128 bits of security against attackers running classical and quantum computers.
